msg.msgText: The LTPA key or token was not decrypted.

msgExplanation.p:
Possible causes include:
The password specified to decrypt the key file is not valid.
The key file was not created by and exported from IBM Websphere Application Server or IBM Worklight Server.
The key file is corrupted.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the password is valid and that the LTPA Key file is created by and exported from IBM Websphere Application Server or IBM Worklight Server.
